summary: An ordinance appropriating the sum of $200.00 out of the general fund of the City of Seattle to pay the claim of L. G. McGuire for damages done to house and personal property located at 1312 Alki Avenue, Seattle, said damages being occasioned by the breaking of a sewer pipe located on 45th Avenue Southwest, et al, adjacent to premises of claimant, which flooded said premises with mud and debris, on or about the 10th day of February, 1916, and authorizing the drawing of a warrant therefor.
